prompts: Create a cute ice-type Pokemon that looks like a scoop of ice cream with blue accents.
Imagine a small Pokemon that embodies winter, featuring snowflakes and frosty colors.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a round shape and a smile, inspired by winter weather.
Design a fluffy ice-type creature that would fit perfectly in a snowy forest environment.
Give me a playful Pokemon that resembles a snow cone, complete with icy blue features.
Show me an ice-type Pokemon that can freeze its surroundings, with a charming and friendly expression.
Make a Pokemon that combines the essence of snow and joy, with a round body and icy details.
